analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.9. Sanidassanaduka🔽Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ
analyzed: sani das sana duka  na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Chapter on the Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct Opposition🔽The Pair on the Visible🔽With the visible as condition, the invisible.🔽With the visible as condition, the non-visible.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sanidassanam dhamma  paṭicca na anidassano ca na anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With the visible as condition, the visible and the non-visible.🔽(In brief.)

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With root-cause as condition, the three. With object as condition, the one. … With the unformed as condition, the three.
